properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.access-key
properties.description: Amazon AWS Access Key.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.activity-list
properties.description: The list name to consume activities from.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.activity-scheduling-options
properties.description: Activity scheduling options. The option is a com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.ActivitySchedulingOptions type.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.activity-thread-pool-size
properties.description: Maximum number of threads in work pool for activity.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.activity-type-execution-options
properties.description: Activity execution options. The option is a com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.ActivityTypeExecutionOptions type.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.activity-type-registration-options
properties.description: Activity registration options. The option is a com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.ActivityTypeRegistrationOptions type.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.amazon-s-w-client
properties.description: To use the given AmazonSimpleWorkflowClient as client. The option is a com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.AmazonSimpleWorkflow type.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.bridge-error-handler
properties.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.child-policy
properties.description: The policy to use on child workflows when terminating a workflow.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.client-configuration-parameters
properties.description: To configure the ClientConfiguration using the key/values from the Map.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.configuration
properties.description: The component configuration. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.aws.swf.SWFConfiguration type.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.data-converter
properties.description: An instance of com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.DataConverter to use for serializing/deserializing the data. The option is a com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.DataConverter type.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.domain-name
properties.description: The workflow domain to use.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the aws-swf component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.event-name
properties.description: The workflow or activity event name to use.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.execution-start-to-close-timeout
properties.description: Set the execution start to close timeout.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.operation
properties.description: Workflow operation

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.region
properties.description: Amazon AWS Region. When using this parameter, the configuration will expect the capitalized name of the region (for example AP_EAST_1) You'll need to use the name Regions.EU_WEST_1.name()

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.s-w-client-parameters
properties.description: To configure the AmazonSimpleWorkflowClient using the key/values from the Map.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.secret-key
properties.description: Amazon AWS Secret Key.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.signal-name
properties.description: The name of the signal to send to the workflow.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.start-workflow-options-parameters
properties.description: To configure the StartWorkflowOptions using the key/values from the Map.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.state-result-type
properties.description: The type of the result when a workflow state is queried.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.task-start-to-close-timeout
properties.description: Set the task start to close timeout.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.termination-details
properties.description: Details for terminating a workflow.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.termination-reason
properties.description: The reason for terminating a workflow.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.version
properties.description: The workflow or activity event version to use.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.workflow-list
properties.description: The list name to consume workflows from.

properties.name: camel.component.aws-swf.workflow-type-registration-options
properties.description: Workflow registration options. The option is a com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.WorkflowTypeRegistrationOptions type.
